info.name: Brick Hill ROBLOX 2012 Theme
info.description:
This brings the old ROBLOX 2012 classic theme to Brick Hill!
IF YOU ARE AN ADMIN INSTALLING THIS THEME! 
Go to "CUSTOMIZE SETTINGS" and select YES.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0 Initial release.
v1.0.1 Fixed a character bug with longer names (such as names up to 15 characters with no spaces)
v1.1 UPDATE! This fixed responsive design bugs
